item.description:
Hey hey! I'm back in town and ready to host yet another TRIVIA NIGHT at the Bell in Hand! Please join us at the Bell in Hand Tavern. It's NOT Stump! trivia but the format is very fun and interactive. Trivia starts at 8:00pm on the side of the tavern with the stage (larger side). Team "The Leftovers II" yet again won the big $50 gift cert last time so I'll be using that to buy some appetizers for the whole group.

Limit is 6 to a team so we'll break up into however many teams, as needed. Please do suggest names and this time I PROMISE I'll compile the responses (sorry I forgot to do that last time).

I should be there by about 7:30pm or so.

REMEMBER that you are responsible for your own food and drinks. PLEASE PAY AS YOU GO OR MAINTAIN YOUR OWN SEPARATE TAB. This event is cross-listed with Social Fun.

Hope to see you there!
item.name: Trivia Night at the Bell in Hand Tavern
